name: InlineTextStyle
desc: The object for applying text styling when not using HTML or Markdown formatting.

items.name: rangeLength
items.desc: The length (in characters) of the portion of text to which the alternative styling should be applied.

items.name: rangeStart
items.desc: The starting point of the text to which the alternative styling should be applied. Note: the first available character is at 0, not 1.

items.name: textStyle
items.desc: Either a text style object or the name of a TextStyle object defined in the ArticleDocument.textStyles object.
